story.text: The Albany state square is a really cool place. There are several of Alexander Calder's works. The Egg is a really interesting building - the whole modern complex was done surprisingly well. Really appreciate the hard work New York stands for. They are all up-starts, as am I. I don't mind.

Sending Tom an email re our technology policy, and I am debating how honest I will be. He is not a tech person - and the tools we use are our competitive advantage. It is silly to tie one hand behind out back - perhaps he revels in such handicapping.
